sentences.sContent: It is an effective liquid separation tool with advantages such as simpleness, celerity and veracity.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is an effective liquid separation tool with advantages such as simpleness, celerity and veracity.
sentences.sCn: 该量取器使用方法简单、快速，是一种准确、有效的液体分离工具。

sentences.sContent: It improves the celerity and accuracy of speed tracking.
sentences.sContent_eng: It improves the celerity and accuracy of speed tracking.
sentences.sCn: 提高速度跟踪的快速性和精确性。

sentences.sContent: The results showed that series-determine method with merits of nicety and celerity has notable effects.
sentences.sContent_eng: The results showed that series-determine method with merits of nicety and celerity has notable effects.
sentences.sCn: 研究结果表明，一次性连续测定法具有快速、准确等优点，效果显著。

remMethod.val: celer(速度) + ity → 快速， 迅速
